title: Well-Being Competency Enhancement Micro-Credential Course for Nurse Anesthesia Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing anesthesia theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Graduate-level nurse anesthesia education program integrating wellness education to strengthen learners' resilience and prevent burnout

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain the nine domains of the AANA Wellness Competency Framework.
Learners can enhance practical skills in applying wellness resources (e.g., helplines) to real clinical scenarios.
Learners can develop and present comprehensive health strategies for stress management and resilience enhancement
Learners demonstrate competency in designing well-being education through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
